summary:
This MOD adds several recipes which craft "house crafting material" by using some kind of ingots.
For example, you can craft "hinge" to using corundum or quicksilver instead of iron ingot.
descriptionHtml:
This MOD adds several recipes which craft "house crafting material" by using some kind of ingots.
For example, you can craft "hinge" to using corundum or quicksilver instead of iron ingot.



FEATURES:

This MOD adds these recipes.
( *  means hidden recipe if you don't have some required item.)



=======Craft by SmithingForge=======

<<Metal Fitting>>(The item was called "iron fitting" before.)
1 iron ingot        = 1
1 steel ingot       = 1 (*)
1 corundum ingot    = 1 (*)
1 dwarven ingot     = 1 (*)
1 quicksilver ingot = 1 (*)
1 ebony ingot       = 1 (*)


<<Nails>>
1 iron ingot           = 10
1 steel ingot          = 10 (*)
1 orichalcum ingot     = 10 (*)
1 ebony ingot          = 10 (*)


<<Hinge>>
1 iron ingot          = 1
1 corundum ingot      = 1 (*)
1 quicksilver ingot   = 1 (*)


<<Lock>>
1 Iron/Steel/Orichalcum/Ebony ingot  +  1 Corundum/Dwarven ingot = 1 (*)


<<Glass>>
1 moonstone ingot      = 2 (*)
1 malachite ingot      = 5


<<Well-Turned Horn>>(The item was called "Goat Horns" before.)
1 Horker Tusk  + 1 Quarried Stone = 1

<<Straw>>
1 Wheat + 1 Quarried Stone = 4


=======Craft by Smelter=======

<<Bone Meal>>
1 Well-Turned Horn = 1 (*)
author: SasameSnow
